name: Moving Factory
description:
This is a game made for the MashUp Game Jam 2.

The game is a factory building game but instead of bringing the resources to the factory, you bring the factory to the resources.

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Run: Left shift

Build: Left mouse button

Remove: Right mouse button

Rotate: R

Switch tool/block: Scroll up/down

Goal:

Destroy rocks with the drill. Transport the material with conveyor belts to a storage block. Put the materials through a processing block for more valuable materials. 

Remember: You can either push your cart or drag it with the rope tool.

Everything made by BatoRoy.
